abstract: Still feeling the fallout from recalls, Toyota was the only full-line manufacturer to report a decline.
snippet: Still feeling the fallout from recalls, Toyota was the only full-line manufacturer to report a decline.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  The domestic auto industry’s long, slow comeback gained traction in December, as the big car companies on Tuesday reported their best monthly sales rate for 2010 and some raised their forecasts for this year.

headline.main: Detroit Carmakers Post Sales Gains as Toyota Lags
headline.print_headline: Detroit Carmakers Post Robust Sales Increases

byline.original: By Bill Vlasic and Nick Bunkley
